attributes.action: Raise a vote of no confidence in our government and trigger a general election
attributes.additional_details: We, the people, are suffering through years of Tory cuts, scandals, criminal prime ministers and cabinet members, multiple prime ministers and a cost of living crisis the likes of us have never seen. We’ve had enough and as a democracy, want to raise our voices.
attributes.background: We, the people of a democratic nation, want to raise a vote of no confidence in our government and trigger a general election

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Call an immediate general election to end the chaos of the current government
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
